website.title: Mrcomputer1's Post Count Progress Bar
website.howmanypostsdoyouhave: How many posts do you have on Scratch?
website.howmanypostsdoyouhavehelp: Go to Scratch > Discuss, then go to the bottom of the page. Click "Show your topics/posts", then click the "Posts" link (not "Topics") to see your post count.
website.previewbtn: Preview and Download image! After clicking wait for image then click again then press download
website.colorrequires: Requires COLOR inputs - Use Mozilla Firefox, Google Chrome and Opera - Safari and Microsoft Internet Explorer not supported
